voiceControl.unsupported: Speech recognition not supported by this browser.

communityReportForm.title: Report a Satellite Sighting

communityReportForm.errorRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields (Satellite Name, Sighting Time, Latitude, Longitude).

budgetChart.title: ISRO Annual Budget Allocation (Nominal)
budgetChart.dataSourceNote: Data manually curated from Wikipedia (ISRO article, Budget section) for demonstration. For official figures, please refer to Department of Space budget documents.

notificationSettings.title: Push Notification Settings
notificationSettings.notSupported: Push notifications are not supported by your browser.
notificationSettings.permissionBlocked: Notification permission is blocked. Please enable it in your browser settings.
notificationSettings.subscribedToast: You will now receive push notifications.
notificationSettings.unsubscribedToast: You will no longer receive push notifications.
notificationSettings.subscribeErrorToast: Could not subscribe to push notifications. Ensure VAPID key is set.
notificationSettings.saveSubscriptionErrorToast: Could not save subscription to server.
notificationSettings.refreshNote: You might need to refresh the page after changing notification permissions in your browser settings.

arSkyView.title: AR Sky View (Experimental)
arSkyView.unsupportedError: Your browser/device may not support WebXR/AR.
arSkyView.note: Note: This feature requires a device with camera and orientation sensors, and browser support for WebXR/DeviceOrientation. Accuracy may vary. For best results, use on a mobile device and grant necessary permissions.
